title: Biden ‘convinced’ Putin plans to invade but says diplomacy ‘always a possibility’
content:
1. Biden ‘convinced’ Putin plans to invade but says diplomacy ‘always a possibility’  The Guardian
  2. Biden gives updates on Russia-Ukraine crisis following call with allies | full video  CBS News
  3. US officials say Russia has list of senior Ukrainian officials it would remove if it invades  CNN
  4. If Putin Pursues 'Grey Zone' Tactics in Ukraine, He'll Be Tough to Stop  The Daily Beast
  5. Citing U.S. Intelligence, Biden Says Putin Has Decided to Invade Ukraine  The New York Times
contentSnippet:
Biden ‘convinced’ Putin plans to invade but says diplomacy ‘always a possibility’  The Guardian
Biden gives updates on Russia-Ukraine crisis following call with allies | full video  CBS News
US officials say Russia has list of senior Ukrainian officials it would remove if it invades  CNN
If Putin Pursues 'Grey Zone' Tactics in Ukraine, He'll Be Tough to Stop  The Daily Beast
Citing U.S. Intelligence, Biden Says Putin Has Decided to Invade Ukraine  The New York Times

localize.title: バイデン氏、プーチンの侵攻計画を「確信」するも、外交は「常に可能性がある」と発言
拜登 "确信 "普京计划入侵，但表示外交手段 "始终是一种可能性
拜登 "確信 "普京計劃入侵，但表示外交手段 "始終是一種可能性
